typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BCP_ActivityStartDate as date,
		BCP_Description as string,
		BCP_Id_Adobe_Campaing as string,
		BCP_InteractionChannel as string,
		BCP_InteractionProduct as string,
		BCP_Registro_Adobe_Campaing as string,
		BCP_Status as string,
		BCP_Type as string,
		BCP_WhatId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CurrencyIsoCode as string,
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		LastModifiedById as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		Name as string,
		OwnerId as string,
		RecordTypeId as string,
		SystemModstamp as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
